Cases

The tumor is present in the left temporal lobe and nearby inferior fronto-occipital fasiculusl tract. Fiber bundle are obtained from original tensor volume by deterministic fiber tracking. Based on the resulting fiber tracts, you have to make a decision for tumor resection surgery.
